thread.section_title: Gift Card Granny Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gift Card Granny | www.giftcardgranny.com
thread.title: Lu Ann
thread.title_full: Gift Card Granny reviewed by Lu Ann

author: Lu Ann
title: Lu Ann
text: I love going through Gift Card Granny to search for discounted gift cards because the search engine is quick and easy, I can choose filters like best deal or price low to high, and many sites are listed so I don't have to check individual sites. It's a great way to buy discounted gift cards.
